#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,x,i,count;
    char str[100002];
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    cin>>str;
    x=strlen(str);
    count=0;
    for(i=0;i<x-1;i++)
    {
        if(str[i]=='0'&&str[i+1]=='1')
            count++;
    }
    cout<<count<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
